ChartSample.Description: Shows a simple chart with tooltips.

ChartSample.Description: Shows the basic chart types and stacking options.

ChartSample.Description: Shows a composite chart.

ChartSample.Description: Shows stock data in a candle chart.

ChartSample.Description: Shows a bubble chart.

ChartSample.Name: Custom Tooltips
ChartSample.Description: Shows a customized tooltip.

ChartSample.Name: Data Labels
ChartSample.Description: Shows a simple chart with static data labels.

ChartSample.Name: Customizing Axes
ChartSample.Description: Shows customized axis style and label format.

ChartSample.Name: Multiple Axes
ChartSample.Description: Shows a chart with mutiple Y axes.

ChartSample.Name: Legend and Titles
ChartSample.Description: Shows basic chart headers and axis titles.

ChartSample.Name: Conditional Formatting
ChartSample.Description: Shows conditional formatting by customizing plot elements.

ChartSample.Name: Custom Plot Elements
ChartSample.Description: Shows how to fully customize plot elements.

ChartSample.Name: Selection Modes
ChartSample.Description: Shows the different selection modes.

ChartSample.Name: Toggle Series
ChartSample.Description: Shows the ability to toggle a series visibility.

ChartSample.Name: Load Animation Mode
ChartSample.Description: Showss animation modes when data is loaded.

ChartSample.Name: Update Animation
ChartSample.Description: Shows animation when data is updated.

ChartSample.Name: Dynamic Charts
ChartSample.Description: Shows a dynamic, “live” chart.

ChartSample.Name: Hit Test
ChartSample.Description: Demonstrates use of the FlexChart's hitTest method.

ChartSample.Name: Scrolling
ChartSample.Description: Shows a chart with panning (or scrolling) along the axes.

ChartSample.Name: Zooming and Scrolling
ChartSample.Description: Shows stretch zoom-out and pinch zoom-in gestures.

ChartSample.Name: Theming
ChartSample.Description: Shows the built-in palettes.

ChartSample.Name: Styling Series
ChartSample.Description: Shows customized series styling.

ChartSample.Description: Shows how to export an image of FlexChart.
